location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter No. 72 to William Hornby, President and Governor, Council at Bombay, from Edward Galley at Bushire

mods.abstract: Discusses several letters sent and received and other administrative issues. Reports that no alteration has taken place in the affairs of Persia. Also mentions the arrival of Mr Robert Holford, a gentleman in service of the Danish (arrived from Copenhagen via Aleppo and Baghdad).
